# Change: 'addPrimaryKey'

Add Primary Key

## XML Sample ##

{% highlight xml %}
<addPrimaryKey catalogName="cat"
        columnNames="A String"
        constraintName="A String"
        schemaName="public"
        tableName="person"
        tablespace="A String"/>
{% endhighlight %}
